alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pierce, west central Brantley and central Ware Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waycross to near Argyle. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Boggy Bay, Manor and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
